mapper.insert: insert into attendance (begintime, endtime, beginstate, endstate, today, month,employeeid) values (#{beginTime},#{endTime},#{beginState},#{endState},#{today},#{month},#{employeeId});
mapper.update: update attendance set begintime = #{beginTime},endTime=#{endTime},beginState=#{beginState},endState=#{endState},today=#{today},month=#{month},employeeId=#{employeeId} where id=#{id};
mapper.select: select * from attendance where today=#{today} and employeeId=#{employeeId};
